page.title: 14Activities for Children.
page.content: There are a number of clubs and societies for the young in Epworth. The local Youth Centre is open between 6.30pm and 8.30pm every Wednesday and offers activities such as pool,hockey,rollerskating,soccer, volleyball,basketball,table soccer and the occasional disco.Sessions for 8 to 13 year olds and 14 to 16 year olds are held separately. In the summer holidays a range of activities is held similar to ones in the Leisure Centre though at a much cheaper cost. There is also a pony club in Epworth which is held each Wednesday from 6pm-8pm.Sixty pence entry fee is charged for events such as horse-jumping and gymkhana games.As well as these there are Brownies, Girl Guides, Girls and Boys Brigade, Dance classes,Atheletics' and Tennis Club.
